thread.title: Carl Bernstein on CNN: Fox News Can Play a ‘Special Role’ in Calling Out Trump Lies
thread.title_full: Carl Bernstein on CNN: Fox News Can Play a ‘Special Role’ in Calling Out Trump Lies

author: Josh Feldman
title: Carl Bernstein on CNN: Fox News Can Play a ‘Special Role’ in Calling Out Trump Lies
text:
Carl Bernstein on CNN: Fox News Can Play a ‘Special Role’ in Calling Out Trump Lies by Josh Feldman | 8:29   video 
Carl Bernstein said on CNN tonight that Fox News can play a “special role” in calling out lies from the Trump administration. 
Bernstein was alarmed by how the White House “declared war on the press” in the past few days and made the press’ conduct the issue over Trump’s conduct. 
“There’s a special role for Fox News in this that I’d like to bring up,” he continued. “And that is when you have the president or the people around him lying, all journalists covering that story need to point it out.” 
Everyone in the press, Bernstein said, needs to come together in “calling out lies.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
